apple_vendor_description: This Apple-designed emoji depicts a loving couple, with the woman and person rendered in distinct dark and medium-dark skin tones, embraced by a soft, glowing heart.  The iconic Apple 3D styling imbues the figures with gentle curves and realistic lighting, making the connection feel warm and genuine.  On Apple devices, this symbol of romantic partnership and affection is perfect for expressing deep feelings of love and commitment between two individuals.
